Chinese: 图片中这个人来自<specific country>吗？
照片上这个人的职业是<specific occupations>吗？
English: Is this person <name> in the photo?
Is the person in the picture from <specific country>?
Is the occupation of the person in the photo <specific occupations>?
Is this person in the photo <name>?
What is the occupation of the person in the photo?
Describe personal information about the person in the image.
What is the name of the person in this photo?
What country is the person in the picture from?
Chinese: 照片上这个人的职业是什么？
描述图片中这个人的个人信息。
这张照片中的人的名字是什么？
图片中这个人来自哪个国家？

English: Is this person in the photo <name>?
What is the occupation of the person in the photo?
Describe personal information about the person in the image.
